doc:
Matt Frewer https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Matt_Frewer 0 Matthew George Frewer (born January 4, 1958) is an American Canadian actor, singer, voice artist and comedian. Acting since 1983, he is best known for portraying the 1980s icon Max Headroom and Doctor Leekie in the Canadian science fiction drama Orphan Black (2013–17). Frewer's most recent performances include a portrayal of "General #2" in the Steven Spielberg picture The BFG (2016) and the character Carnage in the Netflix series Altered Carbon in 2018. Matthew_George_Frewer ( born January_4_,_1958 ) is an_American_Canadian_actor , singer , voice_artist_and_comedian . Acting since 1983 , he is_best_known for portraying the_1980s_icon_Max_Headroom and Doctor_Leekie in the_Canadian_science_fiction_drama_Orphan_Black_(_2013 – 17_) . Frewer 's most_recent performances include a_portrayal of " General_#_2 " in the_Steven_Spielberg_picture The_BFG_(_2016_) and the_character_Carnage in the_Netflix_series_Altered_Carbon in 2018 .
